channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

Outside 100 Alstone Lane

item.title: Damaged cones littering the verges, 17th January
item.description:
There are numerous fallen and damaged cones dotted along the stretch from Seven Springs to the Withington turn, with most being from Pegglesworth through to the Kilkenny pub. They are just littering the highway and serving no purpose at all. As there are roadworks being undertaken along this road, it's an opportunity to remove them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Huge potholes by the bridge badgeworth lane and the Redding’s., 17th January
item.description:
There are huge potholes. Can’t see them in tbd dark and the rain. Numerous incidents and damaged wheels.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Black bollard knocked over, 17th January
item.description:
Top of Millham Road onto station road. Looks like a car has driven into bollard. Top of Millham Road very dangerous because cars park on corner and there are abandoned road work equipment restricting view.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97,99, Station Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Complete bollard is damaged (Non illuminating bollard or post)

item.title: Potholes along the stretch of road, 17th January
item.description:
A number of potholes have appeared since the others were reported & they’re getting bigger. My car has been damaged due to cars driving at speed, hitting the loose stones & them hitting my car! Some of the holes has a white mark pur around them ages ago, but the gold are getting bigger and more have appeared between the roundabout, along Unwin road towards Bridgend road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Unwin Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trip hazard telephone manhole cover on pavement., 17th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.description:

item.title: Deep pothole, 17th January
item.description:
This pothole was repaired last on 17th November 2025 ( ref. 22090642).Repir was poor in past year. This area has been done more than 15 times. localised repair is not suitable, whole larger area should have been repaired.

item.title: Continued parking on double yellow lines, 17th January
item.description:
A van keeps parking on the double yellow lines at the bottom end of Alexandra Street. Despite reporting this on many occasions, nothing has been done.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Alexandra Street, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged road surface, 17th January
item.description:
The whole of Swindon Lane, Cheltenham, between the Racecourse and Windyridge Road, road surface is in a terrible state of repair with pot holes constantly appearing and reappearing. May I request a thorough inspection with a view to scheduling a full surface removal and relaying. That road is used expensively, including busses lorries and by race traffic. It is a particular danger to cyclists - especially now, trying to get to the new green cycle paths.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Swindon Lane, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
